content: flower tasseled bookmark by terry mcclary art coffee words terrymcclary com these make great little gifts yarn in sample is lily sugar n cream in potpourri using an e hook chain 25 do linked treble across see http //www crochetme com/linked-stitch-tutorial for the stitch instructions chain 3 turn *skip next single_crochet single_crochet ch3 all the way around make sure to space it so you have a chain 3 space going around the corners with one in the center of each short end slip st the last ch3 to the base of the beginning chain three finish off weave in ends flower tassels for the first one chain 18 sl into the 7th chain from hook ch6 sl back into the same space repeat until you have 5 petals finish off for the second chain 21 and follow the same instructions as the first tassel weave the ends behind the flowers in use the tails at the ends of the chains to tightly tie the tassels to the bookmark in the center of one short end then weave in the ends i had to block it to get the loops and flowers to stay open nicely this work by terry mcclary is licensed under a creative commons attribution-noncommercial-no derivative works 3 0 united states license
